attributes.action: End the sexist practice of charging men a lot more than women to use some telephone services
attributes.additional_details: When it comes to the use of Premium Rate telephone services, some telephone services seem to allow females to use a freephone number, yet they charge males a Premium Rate to use exactly the same service. Dating services are one example. I would like to put an end to this kind of blatant sexism because I believe that as citizens, we should all be equal no matter who we are. Better still, I would prefer it if Premium Rate telephone services were abolished altogether, but I suppose that would probably be another petition...
